channel.title: Peter R. Spackman
channel.description: Recent content on Peter R. Spackman

item.title: Publications
item.description: Estimating the CCSD basis-set limit energy from small basis sets: basis-set extrapolations vs additivity schemes, AIP Advances 2015 High throughput profiling of molecular shapes in crystals Scientific Reports 2016 Basis set convergence of CCSD(T) equilibrium geometries using a large and diverse set of molecular structures J. Chem. Phys. 2016

item.title: About Me
item.description: PhD student at the University of Western Australia. Focusing on a mixture of cheminformatics, theoretical chemistry and crystal engineering. I’m involved in a few interesting software projects, some of which are: SBF Tonto Crystal Explorer Learn more and contribute to the open source stuff on GitHub. Thanks for reading!
